tool_description: As financial markets getting faster and more complex, it is difficult for market participants to manage the information overload. Sentiment analysis is a useful text mining method to process textual content and filter the results with analysis methods to relevant and meaningful information.
name: Sentiment Analysis in Stock Market
title: Sentiment Analysis in Stock Market

api_list.name: fsentiment
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sentiment-analysis-in-stock-market.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/fsentiment"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentiment-analysis-in-stock-market.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
